document.full_text: dollar dominance is sowing the seeds of financial turmoil, and the solution is to promote new reserve currencies, a chinese government economist said in a paper published on the eve of a g20 meeting about how to reform the global monetary system.
document.title: china economist blasts dollar dominance on eve of g20
lines_and_colors: dollar dominance is sowing the seeds of financial turmoil, and the solution is to promote new reserve currencies, a chinese government economist said in a paper published on the eve of a g20 meeting about how to reform the global monetary system.
